entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Showers beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 late in the evening then west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
